name: Zoo'n Out
description:
Zoo'n Out is a 2v2 team racing game where players compete to reach checkpoints that provides their team with points. Both members need to cross the checkpoints in order to gain points from them.

The game was made to be enjoyed for the whole family, kids and grown-ups alike.

It features:

  • Cooperative mechanics
  • Cute cartoon animals & colorful scenery
  • Physics-based gameplay
  • Relay-course inspired racing track

Creators:

  • Samael Kärvemo
  • Joakim Hedman
  • Evelina Olsen
  • Merle Albrecht
  • Fredrik Magnusson
  • Yao Yu Wu
  • Viktor Lin
  • Emil Ramsell
  • Luca Cosin
